title: Improve Map grave tile hover tooltip contrast (light/dark)

requirements.summary: Increase contrast/readability of the public Map grave-tile hover tooltip in both light and dark themes using shadcn/ui Tooltip composition (without editing ui components).
acceptanceCriteria: On the public Map tab, the tooltip content for a hovered grave tile is clearly readable (good contrast) in both light mode and dark mode.
The tooltip’s primary line identifying the grave (e.g., “Grave no. X”) uses a high-contrast text color against the tooltip background.
Secondary tooltip text (e.g., deceased names) is still visually secondary but remains clearly legible (not washed out / low-contrast).
No backend changes are required; only UI styling/markup changes are made.

file_operations.description: Adjust the shadcn/ui Tooltip (TooltipContent + inner text classes) used for grave tiles to enforce higher-contrast background, border, and text colors in both light/dark themes; update primary and secondary text styling so secondary remains subordinate but legible. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
